Home » 40P14 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
28 Dassanenapahātabbahetukaduka
Dassanenapahātabbahetukaduka
37.
121Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
122Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate nava.
